column4: Hello all! So, here I am trying to watch Season 3 of Friends from Ubuntu 12.04 and while I'm not getting any codec errors in VLC I'm not exactly getting any playtime....Anyone wanna give me some insightful direction?
what is the media stored on? file? DVD?
Yeah it's a DVD, more specifically, it's a DVD that wants to be using InterActual Player 2.0
have you tried a different video output method in the options?
